name: Space Game
description:
Explore an infinite(?) procedural generated cluster of copy-pasted asteroid sprites!

Fight intense, action-packed space battles against little... pink... uh, arrow shaped things.

Upgrade your ship's weapon capabilities for ludicrous prices!

Now featuring galactic terrorism!

Space game is a top-down, 8 bit space shooter game. It was inspired by No Man's Sky. In a similar fashion, ironically, it was overambitious as all hell. It's current form remains unfinished, however I'll try and update it as time passes.

Please report all bugs in the comments, or email me at Sciman1011@Gmail.com

Space game is available for Windows and Android

Update - Added some more sound effects

Update - Added a main menu and the option to toggle fullscreen

Update - Added cheats, and the ability to commit galactic terrorism

Update - Added controller support, and tweaked some other stuff

Update - Added waypoint menu, tweaked a ton of stuff. Made it so the cheats prompt doesn't take you out of fullscreen
